result.reason: Implement keyboard shortcuts for switching between open sessions/tabs to enhance user navigation and productivity.
result.approach: Add keydown event handlers to FrmMain to detect keyboard shortcuts (e.g., Ctrl+Tab, Ctrl+Shift+Tab). Use the pnlDock (DockPanel) to programmatically activate the next or previous ConnectionWindow (tab).
